name: resume_2016
globals: npm install uglify-js -g; npm install -g htmlprocessor; npm install node-sass -g

scripts.build: npm run clean -s; npm run mkdirs -s; npm run jshint; npm run min:all -s; npm run copyassets -s;
scripts.mkdirs: mkdir dist; mkdir dist/css; mkdir dist/js
scripts.min:all: npm run min:js; npm run min:css; npm run process-html
scripts.min:js: uglifyjs js/jquery-1.10.2.min.js js/jquery-migrate-1.2.1.min.js js/jquery.flexslider.js js/waypoints.js js/jquery.fittext.js js/magnific-popup.js js/jquery.nav.js js/jquery.sticky.js js/jquery.easypiechart.min.js js/app.js --compress --mangle --output dist/js/app.min.js --source-map dist/js/app.min.js.map;
scripts.process-html: npm run htmlpre; npm run min:html
scripts.copyassets: mkdir dist/images; cp images/* dist/images; cp js/Modernizr.js dist/js; cp favicon.* dist; mkdir dist/inc; cp inc/* dist/inc;

author: H. Alan Stevens
